headline: United Rentals Named One of America’s Best-Managed Companies
summary: STAMFORD, Conn., February 17, 2026--United Rentals, Inc. (NYSE: URI), the world’s largest equipment rental company, has been again selected to The Wall Street Journal’s Management Top 250 list. The ranking, developed by the Drucker Institute and published by The Wall Street Journal, identifies America’s most effectively managed publicly-traded companies based on comprehensive performance metrics.
